values:
Just testing out my LJ app. I thinks I likes it. :)

Posted via LiveJournal app for iPhone.
LOL! Anybody else remember this song??
Every time I hear this, I miss Bunny and Joshua!
Haven't posted any Wilco for a while. This is one of my favorites.
If anybody wants to start a swing band, count me in! :)
Another blast from the past moment.
My nerdy self has such a crush on this guy.
Blast from the past time again!!
No entirely sure why this popped into my head...
Man, this shoulda won a ton of Tonys. Alas...
This song gets stuck in my head so easily.
Anybody remember when swing was big again in the, like, mid-90s? I miss that.
I swear, Josh Todd could sing the alphabet and make it sound rockin'.
I swear, this song is on every time I get in the car.
This song was playing on a nearby speaker as I watched someone fail a drunk test. Good times.
Hope my KidStagers are ready for auditions tomorrow! (hint, hint) P.S. Study your monologues!
The choreography for this is amazing.
More Beastie Boy love for all y'all.
No idea why, but this was in my head today.
Since we were singing this all morning anyway...LOL
I need someone to follow me around and play this song when I skate.
Saw Sonia @ Sticky FIngerz last night; talked to her and the band afterward. So fun!
OMG! Just had a flashback to 8th grade!!

Guess who's back, back again? Yes, LJ, I have long deserted you. But no longer. Especially since my awesome bro hooked me up with a decent working computer for my house. So, what do you have to look forward to? 1) The real story as to why I am unemployed (this will be a friends-only post, so behave!) 2) Write-ups on The Homecoming, The Women, Dearly Departed, and other theater-related activities. 3) Adventures in working with the KidStage program (especially since we're doing Godspell this summer! ooh, scandalous!) 4) My experiences in roller derby (yes, LJ, since abandoning you for whatever, I've been skating for a couple of years, and it RULES) 5) Blah, blah, blah. C'mere, friends-list. Let's snuggle.

• 11:28 I'm serious. I can't take a beating from my life much longer. For real.

• 07:15 Feeling better, but voice slightly hoarse and airy.
  • 11:14 Ok, awesome skirt- check. Makeup- check. MRD shorts- REPRESENT! Voice- uhhh...
  • 11:58 Just arrived and the audition numbers are already in the 150s. Geez.
  • 12:12 The oldest person I've talked to so far is 28. WHY AM I SO OLD??
  • 12:51 Vicki Rae's here. We've been talking with everybody around us for a while. My voice still isn't so great.
  • 13:02 They're randomly calling about eight numbers at a time and taking them away. Weird.
  • 13:33 Still waiting. Looks like they're taking 11 at a time. And it looks like 5 more groups before mine. So they're gonna make me wait a whil ...
  • 13:48 Apparently, half the girls under the age of 20 are singing "Popular" from Wicked. Cute, but not very original.
  • 13:58 Just changed my 16 bars of music to another section of the song. I am crazy like a fox.
  • 14:05 3 groups to go before me. At this point, I'd rather be curled up on the couch with cough drops.
  • 14:34 Been here nearly 3 hours, and still 2 groups to go before mine.
  • 14:44 One more group before mine.
  • 14:59 Next group's me.
  • 15:30 Got the standard "Thanks for coming in." like everyone else in my group. Doesn't look like they've given anyone a callback sheet in a while.
  • 15:34 And now it's raining on me.
Automatically shipped by LoudTwitter
